desc: It's time to take your commercial space's wallcoverings to a new level with the number one company. Visit us to see the difference exceptional quality wallpaper makes!

layout.text: Bas Meeuws' work breathes new life into the 17-century Dutch and Flemish still life genre. In Bloom is an exclusive collection of the artist's photographic "paintings", printed with precision as show-stopping murals by Astek.
